feature.label: Xross tools
feature.description:
Include editor and runtime for decision tree and xross unit.
Xross unit can build system by flow diagram. Decision tree can model complex logic by a decision tree diagram.
For more detail: http://wiki2.arch.ebay.com/display/TOOLSDEV/Innovation
